solution_line_template: Last week Maya read {books_last_week} * {pages_per_book} = <<{books_last_week}*{pages_per_book}={pages_last_week}>>{pages_last_week} pages of text.
This week she doubled the result, so she read {double} * {pages_last_week} = <<{double}*{pages_last_week}={pages_this_week}>>{pages_this_week} pages.
In total Maya read {pages_last_week} + {pages_this_week} = <<{pages_last_week}+{pages_this_week}={total_pages}>>{total_pages} pages of text.
